message.body: Hi
How are you
Hello! I'm doing well! Enjoying random access memories by draft punk. Do you like it?
And, how are you?
Can you explain? :)
Not sure what that is lol
I'm doing good! Enjoying this weather!
Daft punk is a two person electro pop band. Most famous for their better, faster, stronger song which was sampled by kanye west
Random access memories is their newest album
Cool.
Are you working today
Yes, in Boston. How about you?
I work in New York! I have some friends who live in Boston.
They love it there
One of my friends is studying law in Boston
Nice, where? My wife just graduated bc law - she's taking the bar next week
I think same school
What do you do in NYC?
I'm a speech pathologist
Nice, doing research? Or working with patients?
Working with patients (little ones).
What do you do?
Nice! I work at a healthcare improvement org. We find best practices around the world for patients and try to share them with everyone
Oh interesting.
So you mean like doctor offices? Or jobs!
Jobs?

We look at care delivery and try to see who gets the best results at the lowest price. Who is the most patient centered? Etc. We look at what they do that is different and try to test their methods with other hospitals to see if the ideas are transferable. When there is transferrability we try to scale those changes nation wide
Wow! Is this only for practices in Boston or NY as well?
World wide! Some of our best learnings come from our work in Africa
Sounds very cool!
Which would you say is a top practice in New York?
